name: Mushroom Madness (MattBann)
description:
This game is my second KennyJam, though only my third game jam overall. When I saw the theme was growth, the first thing that came to mind was a platformer that used 'growing' platforms as a mechanic. After checking the available assets, I decided on mushrooms at the platform material, mainly because it was the only practical choice. Its also the first time I've created a platformer like this, so proved a fun challenge.

Credits
  • Visual Assets: Kenney.nl
  • Music: Juhani Junkala (https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure)
  • Font: Zyzol by  Szymon Furjan (https://www.fontspace.com/zyzol-font-f67557)
  • Growth sfx: Almitory (https://opengameart.org/content/digging-underground)
